actions.committee: House Committee on Public Works and Transportation
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Public Works and Transportation.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide a mandatory 60-day notice period to a change in any rate, fare, or charge specified in any effective tariff of any air carrier or foreign air carrier.

summary.text: Provides, under the Federal Aviation Act, for a mandatory sixty-day notice period prior to a change in any rate, fare, or charge specified in any effective tariff of any air carrier or foreign air carrier.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to provide a mandatory 60-day notice period to a change in any rate, fare, or charge specified in any effective tariff of any air carrier or foreign air carrier.
